shortDescription: The Microsoft (1) JScript and (2) VBScript engines, as used in Internet Explorer 11, allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted web site, aka "Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability."
vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Internet Explorer Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
